long_description: Whether you're a big wall climber, a traditional alpinist or a redpoint gymnast, you'll appreciate the light and strong Black Diamond Neutrino carabiner. Great for racking, the Neutrino is available in 6 individual colors that match the colors of the Black Diamond Camalot C4 cams. 7075-T6 aluminum body features a large area to seat slings and draws securely, and a nose hood to protect the gate from being opened accidentally. Large gate opening allows quick clip-ins. Useful in mountaineering or ice climbing applications because the 1-piece gate and spring mechanism won't freeze up.
short_description: Whether you're a big wall climber, a traditional alpinist or a redpoint gymnast, you'll appreciate the light and strong Black Diamond Neutrino carabiner.
